name: Brazil States Match Free
description:
Learn while you play, play while you learn! Are you a curious person with a strong interest in the states of Brazil? Why not play a game, have fun and while going that, test your knowledge and learn. Now, all NEW Brazil Geo Match FREE Edition is available. An addictive game that helps you learn Brazil states' capitals, flags and maps while you play and beat your previous high scores. Match the entries on each section and match them before time runs out.
Remember, as you crack the levels, they get tougher... and interesting.
Topics covered:
Brazil's state ... and match it with its
• Capital city
• Flag
• Map

Sharpen your mind and fingers and learn about Brazil!
